description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Block Shift is a puzzle game requiring you to piece together a picture from its parts. You can move each row and column as a whole unit. Includes over 80 puzzles including your gamer image in puzzle form! Also includes a mapmaker to build your own puzzles.
description.short: Block Shift is a puzzle game requiring you to piece together a picture from its parts. You can move each row and column as a whole unit. Includes over 80 puzzles including your gamer image in puzzle form! Also includes a mapmaker to build your own puzzles.
